title: 88. Accutane, Face Reality, HydraFacial + more with Master Esthetician ALYSSA BROCK.
description:
Welcome to The Treatment Room! In this episode, I chat with Alyssa Brock aka @alyssatheillinoisesti (owner of lyss skin studio, master hydrafacialist, and face reality certified acne expert.) We chat everything from Alyssa's acne journey, to working for doctors, to her studio favorites!

ALYSSA'S TREATMENT ROOM FAVORITES

Alyssa’s comfy bed

Alyssa’s diffuser

Kacey’s glow towels

This episode is sponsored by Gloss Genius. Use promo code: TTR22S Link: https://glossgenius.biz/TTR22S-signup Offer: 50% off for 2 months 

MY SOCIAL MEDIA + SHOPS 

Book a skin consultation or mentorship call with me: www.tessaskin.com

For more details on my products, visit www.freeskinbytessa.com, or follow along on instagram @freeskinbytessa. 

To shop Glymed Plus, register on the top right via my authorized store: https://glymedplus.com/home/index
